summary: Adds Destiny a follower based on the idea of the movie The Nightmare Before Christmas in which Tim Burtan mixed Halloween with Christmas.
descriptionHtml:
[center]﻿


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff00ff][size=5]As always thanks so much for the support! New V.IP. program where you earn early access to our mods to review and give feedback on NOT involving endorsements as those are voluntary. Again thank you! 

[/size][/color][color=#1e84cc][size=4]~The Majestic Team~
[/size][/color][/font]
[img]http://funkyimg.com/i/2Axz8.png[/img]

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#ff00ff]Yep we done did it! Created a creepy looking follower for Christmas. Find her in Blind Cliff Cave (blindcliffcave01) in the console. Destiny came from the idea of mixing Halloween with Christmas and in no way is she a character from the movie. If your NOT into creepy looking females with hot bodies then move on, no need to comment that you are. However, if you are into this sort of thing then you hit the Jackpot! She wasn't planned to be lore friendly nor was she planned to be "just a pretty face." What she was intentionally planned for was scarring a guard or citizen out of a sweet roll or mead. Her skill bonus's (Archery, One-Two handed etc.) are set as high as they go 127. Health, Stamina and Magicka 500. Speed 165 and her Combat is set to focus on Melee and archery however, she comes with two spells, vamp drain and frostbite both enhanced for higher levels. She comes with the slutty Christmas mashup armor because well...We thought we would go with a users idea and start a Sluts Of Skyrim series :p [/color]

[color=#1e84cc]Note: CBBE cannot be offered because I don't feel like spending hours in Photoshop trying to recreate her face again. [/color]

[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff00ff][size=5]Essential
Can be Married
Height: 1.0
Weight: 1.0
Race: Vampire/Nord
[/size][/color][/font]
